metadata.title: RHSA-2019:1571: rhvm-appliance security, bug fix, and enhancement update (Moderate)
metadata.description:
The RHV-M Virtual Appliance automates the process of installing and configuring the Red Hat Virtualization Manager. The appliance is available to download as an OVA file from the Customer Portal.

Security Fix(es):

* cockpit: Crash when parsing invalid base64 headers (CVE-2019-3804)

For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.

bugzilla.text: CVE-2019-3804 cockpit: Crash when parsing invalid base64 headers

platform: Red Hat Virtualization 4 for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7 is installed
rhvm-appliance is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
